info.title: Basketball - WCBK
info.description: The API calls below can be used to test the Input and Output of our API endpoints.  You'll need an API key and an assigned secret to access the live data and so if you haven't contacted us yet, now is the time!  Our sales staff would be happy to set you up with trial access so you can begin to evaluate the product. WCBK - Women's College Basketball

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: A teamId returns information for that team only.  If entered, then the conferenceId is ignored.

parameters.name: conferenceId
parameters.description: A conferenceId returns teams in the selected conference.

parameters.name: collegeSubDivisionId
parameters.description: Entering a collegeSubDivisionId will return only the teams in that division

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Access to this events endpoint will provide you wi...
get.description:
Access to this events endpoint will provide you with the highest level of game data including live scores and box scores.  The first 2 parameters (eventId, box) are only applicable for a specific game.
 Events will also provide you with schedule data.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description:
Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box request.
 Default - basic score data will be returned using date or season, if entered, else the current days events will be returned

parameters.name: linescore
parameters.description:
Linescores are only returned when requested and will be returned for all events in the results.
  Default - false, line score data will not be returned

parameters.name: conferenceId
parameters.description: A conferenceId returns teams in the selected conference.

parameters.name: box
parameters.description:
Returns the box score for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'box=true'.
  Default - box score data will not be returned

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific game isn't requested, all games from the current date will be returned

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: top25PollId
parameters.description: If used, will return only games involving top 25 teams for the selected pollId. Only applicable for a single day's games, and therefore must be used in conjunction with the &date paramenter, or the default (current day) call.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: tournamentId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games for this tournament.
  Default - Regular Season

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: The box/ resource provides scores/schedules and bo...
get.description: The box/ resource provides scores/schedules and box score information for WCBK events.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description:
Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box request.
 Default - basic score data will be returned using date or season, if entered, else the current days events will be returned

parameters.name: linescore
parameters.description:
Linescores are only returned when requested and will be returned for all events in the results.
  Default - false, line score data will not be returned

parameters.name: conferenceId
parameters.description: A conferenceId returns teams in the selected conference.

parameters.name: box
parameters.description:
Returns the box score for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'box=true'.
  Default - box score data will not be returned

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific game isn't requested, all games from the current date will be returned

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: top25PollId
parameters.description: If used, will return only games involving top 25 teams for the selected pollId. Only applicable for a single day's games, and therefore must be used in conjunction with the &date paramenter, or the default (current day) call.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:

parameters.description:

parameters.name: languageId

  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.description:

  Default - json

get.summary: The scores/ resource provides score and schedule i...
get.description: The scores/ resource provides score and schedule information for WCBK events.  (Box is not an option.)

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description:
Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box request.
 Default - basic score data will be returned using date or season, if entered, else the current days events will be returned

parameters.description:

  Default - false, line score data will not be returned

get.description: The participants endpoint provides biographical information for players and can be used to return information on a single player, a single teams roster, all teams rosters within the league, or all free agents.

Anyone who last played since the requested year.  Enter year as YYYY.
  Default -

get.summary: College Basketball polls

parameters.name: pollId
parameters.description:
The decodes resource provides a list of available codes.
 Default - Associated Press

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: pollDate
parameters.description:
Returns the most recent poll less than or equal to the date entered.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - the most recent poll

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: WCBK - Season stats for a single player

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: To get information on a specific player, enter their ID.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: enc
parameters.description:
The 'encyclopedia returns full career and season-by-season totals.
 Notes:
  The encyclopedia is valid for a single player only.  If playerId is omitted, 'enc=true' will be ignored.
  If 'enc=true', the seasonId will be ignored if included.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: careerOnly
parameters.description: For a single player's career stats, only to be used in conjunction with 'enc=true'

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: WCBK - Player splits (breakdowns).

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: To get information on a specific player, enter their ID.

parameters.name: splitId
parameters.description:
Enter the stat split to be returned. (The decodes resource provides a list of available codes.)
  1. If omitted, only official total stats (splitId = -1) will be returned. 
  2. If 'all', all the splits are returned.
  3. Otherwise, the entered split is returned.
  Default - Official totals (splitId = -1)

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: WCBK - Leaders

parameters.name: leaderCategoryId
parameters.description:
Only one category per query.  The decodes resource provides a list of available codes. 
  Default - Blank (returns Minutes).

parameters.name: topCount
parameters.description:
This is the number of leaders to be returned.
  You can return all leaders with the word 'all' instead of a number.
  Default - Top 10 (plus ties), utilizing ranked players only if nonQualifiers is false/null; else will utilize ordered players.

parameters.name: nonQualifiers
parameters.description:
Should non-qualifiers be returned?
  Default - false

parameters.name: sortType
parameters.description:
To return 'worst' players (trailers) rather than 'best' players (leaders) in a category, select sortType = worst. Traliers are not available for every leaderCategoryId.
  Default - If the sortType parameter is not used, leaders will be returned.

parameters.name: conferenceId
parameters.description: A conferenceId returns teams in the selected conference.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
To get data for players on one team only, enter the teamId.
  Default - all players

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

parameters.name: conferenceId

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: eventRoundId
parameters.description:
Leaders among games in the specified eventRound only. See eventRounds decode endpoint for full list.
  Default - all rounds

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
To get data for players on one team only, enter the teamId.
  Default - all players

parameters.name: languageId

get.summary: WCBK - Decodes

parameters.name: decodeType
parameters.description: The data type to be decoded.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: allSeasons
parameters.description:
For seasonStructure only. To get complete history of league, select allSeasons=TRUE. Only those permissioned for all historic data will be able to utilize the 'allSeasons' option.
  Default - false

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json
